circuit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path
circuit.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We did a circuit of the old city.
circuit.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a track that cars, motorbikes etc race around
circuit.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the complete circle that an electric current travels
circuit.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a regular trip around an area made by a judge or a religious leader, so that a court of law or church can meet in several different places
